cvmx_llm_data_t::cn31xx_par_struct

cvmx_llm_data_t::cn31xx_par_struct Struct Reference

This format defines what should be used if parity is desired. More...

#include <cvmx-llm.h>

Data Fields

uint64_t mbz:32
uint64_t par:1
uint64_t dat:31

Detailed Description

This format defines what should be used if parity is desired.

Hardware returns the XOR of all the bits in the 36/32 bit data word, so for parity software must use one of the data field bits as a parity bit.
